command.source: SELECT PICO_ID, FRMLY_ID, FRMLY_SRC_CD, NDC11_ID, EFF_DT, TERM_DT, RATE_QLFR_CD, MAIL_RATE_T2_AMT, MAIL_RATE_T3_AMT, RTL_RATE_T2_AMT, RTL_RATE_T3_AMT, EXCL_MAIL_CD, EXCL_THER_CD, ADD_DT, MOD_DT FROM ${cli_schema}.mfg_rate ORDER BY 1,2,3,4,5
command.target: INSERT INTO ${cli_schema}.mfg_rate (PICO_ID, FRMLY_ID, FRMLY_SRC_CD, NDC11_ID, EFF_DT, TERM_DT, RATE_QLFR_CD, MAIL_RATE_T2_AMT, MAIL_RATE_T3_AMT, RTL_RATE_T2_AMT, RTL_RATE_T3_AMT, EXCL_MAIL_CD, EXCL_THER_CD, ADD_DT, MOD_DT ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )

catch.command:
[ERROR] REFRESH CLIENT - MFG_RATE

#if (${system.getProperty('logfile')}) #end
Host:${localhost}
Started:${startTime}
Script:${scriptName}
Log File: ${system.getProperty('logfile')}


#if (${script.getLastStatement()})

Last Statement

${script.getLastStatement()}

#end
